QuestData.Title: Shriek No More
QuestData.Description: Papa loved this village. He'd never hear of leaving, even in these dread times.$B$BBefore he died, he told me what attacked him: a monstrous falcon we call Rotbeak.$B$BYou're fighting these undead, aren't you? Will you avenge my father? If so, you can find the beast northwest of here, patrolling our western route to the sea.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Rotbeak along the Bradensbrook, and collect the beast's head.
QuestData.CompletionText: Papa always said the only way he'd leave here would be feet-first.$B$BI wish he'd been wrong.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you. Grisly, eh? I think I'll mount it over the door.$B$BI want you to have this, too. Fresh-caught mossgill was Papa's favorite.
